iSSimple develop software, supply hardware, integrate complete solutions for Interactive Systems, Touch Screen Applications, Digital Signage, Control and Automation. WE PROVIDE TOUCH SCREEN APPLICATIONS FOR EVERYDAY BUSINESSS AND ORGANIZATIONS NEEDS. Company based at Bangkok (Thailand), but solutions are delivered worldwide. We use latest Microsoft .NET and WPF software technologies and modern hardware for satisfy any kind of customer needs. Also iSSimple provide custom software development, content and design services, web-applications.
